ground_truth: Beneath a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow perched on a gentle slope looks out over an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail swigs from a small plastic bottle as she contemplates an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her. In a flashback, she steps out of her knickers and walks slowly across the room toward a skinny boy sitting bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles the boy's lap, giving a tentative smile as she brings her rosebud lips close to his face, stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy blond dog does what he's told. The girl takes a swig of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her hoodie. She picks up a pregnancy kit, then reaches for the washroom key, which he hands to her. In the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the lavatory seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, brings out a narrow paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. She pulls out the stick and gives it a cursory look, then hurries back through the store towards the counter where she slaps a pack of sweets onto it and gazes at the test. She shakes it, rolls her eyes at the clerk, and leaves the store, stick in hand, her expression suddenly forlorn. Juno slings a rope of candy onto the branch of a tree and makes a noose, bites into the liquorish rope, and wanders off home. Bedrooms have the light switch doubling as a doll's penis, and naked dolls are clustered on the mantelpiece. There's a photo of Bleeker playing his guitar. Juno dials a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, and a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit on her chest answers. They take up the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car. Bleeker hands Juno a note and she beams. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow sports kit. Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A posse of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband, the color washing from his pale cheeks. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows. A thin smile flashes across her heart-shaped face, and she cuts a pipe between her teeth. She gets on her bike and rides off, leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich. Juno cycles up to Dancing Elk School, parks her bike, and secures it with a chain lock. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students, most of them taller than her, reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Underneath a overcast sky, a single-story cottage perched on a mild incline gazes out over an irregular grass. An adolescent girl with short chestnut hair tied back in a small ponytail drinks from a small synthetic bottle as she considers an armchair standing on the grass in front of her. In a recollection, she steps out of her underwear and walks slowly across the room toward a thin boy sitting bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles the boy's lap, giving a hesitant smile as she brings her rosebud lips close to his face, stopping his mouth with a gentle kiss. The shaggy blonde canine does what he's commanded. The girl takes a drink of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her hoodie. She picks up a pregnancy kit, then reaches for the bathroom key, which he hands to her. In the bathroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the toilet seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, brings out a narrow paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. She pulls out the stick and gives it a brief look, then hurries back through the store towards the counter where she slaps a pack of candies onto it and gazes at the test. She shakes it, rolls her eyes at the cashier, and leaves the store, stick in hand, her expression suddenly dejected. Juno slings a rope of candy onto the limb of a tree and makes a loop, bites into the licorice rope, and wanders off home. Bedrooms have the light switch doubling as a doll's penis, and unclothed dolls are clustered on the mantelpiece. There's a photo of Bleeker playing his guitar. Juno dials a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, and a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit on her chest answers. They take up the armchair, shoving it into the back of a vehicle. Bleeker hands Juno a note and she beams. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow athletic kit. Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A group of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband, the color draining from his pale cheeks. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows. A thin smile flashes across her heart-shaped face, and she cuts a pipe between her teeth. She gets on her bicycle and rides off, leaving Bleeker holding his sandwich. Juno cycles up to Dancing Elk School, parks her bicycle, and secures it with a chain lock. She makes her way past the oncoming crowd of students, most of them taller than her, reaching her locker.

A small plastic bottle is swigged from by a teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail as an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her is contemplated by her. The light switch doubles as a doll's penis in bedrooms, and naked dolls cluster on the mantelpiece. Bleeker is shown playing his guitar in a photo. A note is handed to Juno by Bleeker, and she beams. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow sports kit. The armchair on his front lawn is sat in by Juno. Bleeker swallows, and Juno blinks happily. A thin smile is flashed across her heart-shaped face, and a pipe is cut between her teeth. Her bike is mounted by her and ridden off, leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich. Dancing Elk School is cycled up to by Juno, her bike is parked, and it is secured with a chain lock by her. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students, most of whom are taller than her, reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Under cloudy skies, a low-rise bungalow on a gentle slope overlooks an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied in a ponytail drinks from a small bottle, eyeing an armchair on the lawn. Flashback: she sheds her knickers and walks toward a skinny boy in the armchair, wearing just a T-shirt. Smiling, she kisses him. The shaggy blond dog obeys commands. She sips juice, wipes her mouth on her hoodie, picks up a pregnancy kit, and takes the washroom key. In the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits on the toilet, and uses the kit. She checks the result and hurries to the counter, placing a pack of sweets while looking at the test. Shaking it, she rolls her eyes at the clerk, leaves forlorn, and makes a candy rope noose on a tree branch, then heads home. Bedrooms feature light switches as doll parts, with naked dolls on the mantelpiece and Bleeker's guitar photo. Juno calls on her hamburger phone; a girl with a rabbit on her chest answers. They load the armchair into a car. Bleeker gives Juno a note, and she beams; he's in his sports kit. Juno sits on the lawn armchair. Runners pass, and Juno looks down as Bleeker's eyes cross under his sweatband, cheeks pale. Juno smiles thinly, bites a pipe, rides off leaving Bleeker with his sandwich. Juno cycles to Dancing Elk School, parks, and locks her bike, then navigates through taller students to her locker.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Beneath cloudy skies, a bungalow overlooks an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair drinks from a plastic bottle while eyeing an armchair on the lawn. In a flashback, wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles a bare-chested boy, smiles, and kisses him. The girl takes a swig of juice, wipes her mouth on her hoodie, picks up a pregnancy kit, and heads to the washroom. She unzips her jeans, uses the kit, checks the result quickly, and rushes back to the counter to buy sweets, then leaves, appearing forlorn. Juno hangs candy on a tree, bites it, and goes home. Bedrooms feature unique decorations, and a photo of Bleeker with his guitar. Juno calls a friend using her hamburger phone. They load the armchair into a car. Bleeker gives Juno a note, making her beam, and wears a sports kit. Juno sits in the armchair on the lawn as runners pass by. She smiles at Bleeker, then rides her bike to Dancing Elk School, locks it, and heads to her locker amidst taller students.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Underneath a sky thickly laden with clouds, a modest, low-rise bungalow sits quietly perched upon a gentle, rolling slope, its view extending over a somewhat uneven and ragged lawn. A teenage girl, youthful in appearance, with short, brown hair neatly tied back into a small, tidy ponytail, takes a hearty swig from a small plastic bottle as she thoughtfully regards an armchair situated on the grassy lawn in front of her. In a vivid flashback, she is seen stepping out of her knickers, making her way slowly and deliberately across the room toward a rather skinny boy who sits bare-chested in that same armchair. Clad in nothing more than a simple T-shirt, she carefully straddles the boy's lap, offering a tentative smile as she gently brings her rosebud-shaped lips close to his face, stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy, blond dog obediently follows instructions. The girl takes another swig of her juice and wipes her mouth clean with the sleeve of her hoodie. She then picks up a pregnancy test kit, reaching for the washroom key, which he promptly hands to her. Inside the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the toilet seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, takes out a slim, paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. She pulls out the stick and gives it a quick glance, then hurries back through the bustling store toward the counter, where she places a pack of sweets with a slight slap and gazes at the test in her hand. She gives it a shake, rolls her eyes at the clerk behind the counter, and exits the store with the stick still in hand, her expression turning suddenly forlorn. Juno, with a playful air, drapes a long rope of candy onto the branch of a tree, fashioning it into a makeshift noose, bites into the licorice rope, and wanders off toward home. The bedrooms are quirky, with the light switch serving double duty as a doll's penis, and naked dolls are grouped together on the mantelpiece. A photograph of Bleeker playing his guitar is prominently displayed. Juno dials a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, and elsewhere, a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit resting on her chest picks up. They manage to maneuver the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car. Bleeker hands Juno a note, and she beams with delight. Bleeker is decked out in his brown and yellow sports kit. Juno makes herself comfortable in the armchair situated on his front lawn. A group of runners, clad in brown and yellow, passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her gaze as Bleeker's eyes meet hers beneath his yellow sweatband, with the color draining from his already pale cheeks. Juno blinks joyfully as Bleeker swallows nervously. A thin smile flickers across her heart-shaped face, and she bites into a piece of pipe between her teeth. She mounts her bike and rides away, leaving Bleeker standing there with his sandwich in hand. Juno cycles up to the entrance of Dancing Elk School, parks her bike securely, and locks it with a sturdy chain lock. She navigates her way through the oncoming wave of students, most of whom are taller than she is, finally reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Beneath a sky heavily laden with gray, billowing clouds, a modest bungalow of simple, low-rise design sits quietly and unassumingly perched atop a gentle, rolling slope. From its vantage point, the view stretches over a somewhat uneven and ragged patch of lawn, giving the scene a rather rustic charm. A teenage girl, possessing a youthful appearance, with her short, brown hair neatly tied back into a small, tidy ponytail, takes a hearty swig from a small plastic bottle as she thoughtfully regards an armchair positioned on the grassy lawn in front of her. In an evocative and vivid flashback, she is seen stepping out of her knickers, moving slowly and deliberately across the room toward a rather skinny boy who sits bare-chested in that same armchair. Clad in nothing more than a simple T-shirt, she carefully straddles the boy's lap, offering a tentative, shy smile as she gently brings her rosebud-shaped lips close to his face, silencing his mouth with a tender, lingering kiss. Meanwhile, a shaggy, blond dog obediently follows their instructions, adding to the scene's quaint atmosphere. The girl takes yet another swig of her juice, wipes her mouth clean with the sleeve of her hoodie, and picks up a pregnancy test kit, reaching out for the washroom key, which he promptly hands to her. Once inside the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the toilet seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, and takes out the slim, paddle-shaped stick, putting it into position. She pulls the stick out and gives it a quick, furtive glance, then hurries back through the bustling store toward the counter, where she places a pack of sweets with a slight slap and gazes intently at the test in her hand. She gives it a shake, rolls her eyes at the clerk behind the counter, and exits the store with the stick still in hand, her expression turning suddenly forlorn. With a playful air, Juno drapes a long, colorful rope of candy onto the branch of a tree, fashioning it into a makeshift noose, then bites into the licorice rope and leisurely wanders off toward her home. The bedrooms in the house are quirky in design, with the light switch ingeniously serving double duty as a doll's penis, and naked dolls are amusingly grouped together on the mantelpiece. A prominently displayed photograph captures Bleeker playing his guitar. Juno then dials a number on her whimsical, hamburger-shaped phone, and elsewhere, a girl lying comfortably on her bed with a rabbit resting on her chest picks up the call. Together, they manage to maneuver the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car. Bleeker hands Juno a note, and she beams with delight, her face lighting up with happiness. Bleeker is decked out in his distinctive brown and yellow sports kit. Juno makes herself comfortable in the armchair situated on his front lawn. A group of runners, all clad in matching brown and yellow attire, passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her gaze as Bleeker's eyes meet hers beneath his yellow sweatband, with the color visibly draining from his already pale cheeks. Juno blinks joyfully, while Bleeker swallows nervously. A thin smile flickers across her heart-shaped face, and she bites into a piece of pipe between her teeth. She mounts her bike and rides away, leaving Bleeker standing there with his sandwich in hand. Juno cycles up to the entrance of Dancing Elk School, parks her bike securely, and locks it with a sturdy chain lock. She carefully navigates her way through the oncoming wave of students, most of whom are noticeably taller than she is, finally reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Beneath a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow perched on a gentle slope offers an unobstructed view of the uneven lawn stretching out before it. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail lifts a small plastic bottle to her lips, taking a swig as she stands absorbed in contemplation of an armchair situated on the lawn in front of her. Suddenly, a flashback takes her to a moment where she steps out of her knickers and moves with measured, deliberate steps across the room towards a skinny boy who sits bare-chested in the same armchair. Clad only in a T-shirt, she confidently straddles the boy's lap, her face breaking into a tentative smile. She gently leans forward, her rosebud lips inching closer to his face until they softly connect with his mouth, stopping it in a tender kiss. Meanwhile, a shaggy blond dog attentively responds to commands, performing as expected. The girl, back in the present, takes another swig of juice, then casually wipes her mouth with the sleeve of her hoodie. With determination, she picks up a pregnancy kit and reaches for the washroom key, which is promptly handed to her by someone nearby. Once in the washroom, she carefully unzips her jeans, lowers herself onto the lavatory seat, and methodically opens the pregnancy detection kit, extracting a narrow paddle-shaped stick and positioning it with precision. After using the stick, she gives it a cursory glance and then hastily makes her way back through the store towards the counter. There, she emphatically slaps a pack of sweets onto it while gazing intently at the test. She gives the test a shake, rolls her eyes at the clerk with a mix of exasperation and disbelief, and exits the store, clutching the stick with a suddenly forlorn expression. The girl, identified as Juno, playfully slings a rope of candy over a tree branch, forming a makeshift noose, takes a playful bite into the licorice rope, and eventually meanders off towards her home. In Juno’s bedroom, unique décor includes a light switch that doubles as a doll's penis and an assortment of naked dolls clustered together on the mantelpiece, alongside a photo capturing Bleeker mid-guitar strum. With intent concentration, Juno dials a number on her quirky hamburger-shaped phone, initiating a call to a girl lounging on her bed with a rabbit comfortably resting on her chest. Together, they take up the armchair, maneuvering to shove it into the backseat of a car. Bleeker, with a shy demeanor, hands Juno a note that immediately lights up her expression into a beaming smile. Clad in his brown and yellow sports kit, Bleeker stands nearby as Juno situates herself comfortably in the armchair on his front lawn. A lively posse of runners decked out in brown and yellow sports attire passes by on a rug, creating a brief yet colorful spectacle. Juno lowers her eyes thoughtfully as Bleeker looks back at her, his eyes darting beneath the bright yellow of his sweatband, the color gradually draining from his pale cheeks. With a blink of contentment, Juno acknowledges Bleeker, who visibly swallows, while a subtle smile flickers across her heart-shaped face. With a playful gesture, she cuts a pipe between her teeth, then mounts her bike and confidently rides away, leaving Bleeker behind, still clutching his sandwich. Juno pedals her way up to Dancing Elk School, methodically parks her bike, and secures it with a chain lock, before weaving through the oncoming throng of students, most towering over her, until she finally arrives at her locker.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
Under a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow overlooks an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair, tied back in a ponytail, drinks from a small plastic bottle while contemplating an armchair on the lawn. In a flashback, she removes her knickers and approaches a skinny boy, seated bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles his lap, smiling tentatively before kissing him tenderly. Afterward, she drinks juice, wipes her mouth on her hoodie sleeve, picks up a pregnancy kit, and takes the washroom key from him. Inside the washroom, she tests for pregnancy and briefly checks the result. Hurrying back through the store, she slaps a pack of sweets onto the counter while gazing at the test, then shakes it and exits, her expression suddenly forlorn. 

Juno uses a candy rope to make a noose on a tree branch, bites into it, and heads home. Her bedroom features a light switch resembling a doll's penis and naked dolls on the mantelpiece, along with a photo of Bleeker playing guitar. She dials a friend on her hamburger-shaped phone, and they converse. Later, they move the armchair into a car. Bleeker gives Juno a note, and she beams. Bleeker, wearing his sports kit, watches as Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A group of runners in brown and yellow passes by. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's gaze, beneath his yellow sweatband, crosses hers, causing a thin smile on her face. She bites a pipe between her teeth, then rides off on her bike, leaving Bleeker holding his sandwich. Juno cycles to Dancing Elk School, parks her bike, locks it with a chain, and navigates through the taller students to reach her locker.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Beneath a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow perched on a gentle slope, typical of suburban houses in the Pacific Northwest known for their sprawling lawns, looks out over an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail swigs from a small plastic bottle of apple juice, a popular convenience store choice, as she contemplates an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her, a relic from an eclectic yard sale. In a flashback, she steps out of her knickers, discarding them with the nonchalance often seen in teenage impulsivity, and walks slowly across the room toward a skinny boy sitting bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles the boy's lap, giving a tentative smile as she brings her rosebud lips, a vivid crimson shade that stands in stark contrast to her pale complexion, close to his face, stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy blond dog, a loyal companion and often the silent witness to her teenage escapades, does what he's told. The girl takes a swig of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her well-worn hoodie, a favorite garment that offers comfort in its familiar fabric. She picks up a pregnancy kit, then reaches for the washroom key, which he hands to her with a solemn understanding of the gravity of the situation. In the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the lavatory seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, a brand known for its reliability, brings out a narrow paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. She pulls out the stick and gives it a cursory look, then hurries back through the store towards the counter where she slaps a pack of sweets onto it and gazes at the test. She shakes it, rolls her eyes at the clerk, a sympathetic figure who often sees such teenage dramas unfold, and leaves the store, stick in hand, her expression suddenly forlorn at the weight of its implications. Juno, known for her quirky humor, slings a rope of candy onto the branch of a tree and makes a noose, bites into the liquorish rope, and wanders off home. Bedrooms have the light switch doubling as a doll's penis, a manifestation of the household's eccentricity, and naked dolls are clustered on the mantelpiece, a collection that has grown over the years. There's a photo of Bleeker playing his guitar, a hobby that offers him solace. Juno dials a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, an item that perfectly encapsulates her whimsical nature, and a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit on her chest, a comforting pet during times of stress, answers. They take up the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car that has seen better days. Bleeker hands Juno a note and she beams, touched by his heartfelt gesture. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow sports kit, the colors of Dancing Elk High School that he's proud to represent. Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A posse of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug, participating in a practice session for the upcoming track meet. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband, the color washing from his pale cheeks as he realizes the significance of their conversation. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows, understanding their unspoken connection. A thin smile flashes across her heart-shaped face, and she cuts a pipe between her teeth, a habit she picked up in her more rebellious phases. She gets on her bike, a gift from her father for her last birthday, and rides off, leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich, a hastily made meal before practice. Juno cycles up to Dancing Elk School, a place she finds both stifling and freeing, parks her bike, and secures it with a chain lock. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students, most of them taller than her and laden with the trappings of teenage life, reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: Beneath a cloudy sky a lowrise bungalow perched on a gentle slope looks out over an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail swigs from a small plastic bottle as she contemplates an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her. In a flashback she steps out of her knickers and walks slowly across the room toward a skinny boy sitting barechested in the same armchair. Wearing just a Tshirt she straddles the boy's lap giving a tentative smile as she brings her rosebud lips close to his face stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy blond dog does what he is told. The girl takes a swig of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her hoodie. She picks up a pregnancy kit then reaches for the washroom key which he hands to her. In the washroom she unzips her jeans sits down on the lavatory seat opens the pregnancy detection kit brings out a narrow paddleshaped stick and puts it into position. She pulls out the stick and gives it a cursory look then hurries back through the store towards the counter where she slaps a pack of sweets onto it and gazes at the test. She shakes it rolls her eyes at the clerk and leaves the store stick in hand her expression suddenly forlorn. Juno slings a rope of candy onto the branch of a tree and makes a noose bites into the liquorish rope and wanders off home. Bedrooms have the light switch doubling as a doll's penis and naked dolls are clustered on the mantelpiece. There is a photo of Bleeker playing his guitar. Juno dials a number on her hamburgershaped phone and a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit on her chest. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. answers. They take up the armchair shoving it into the back of a car. Bleeker hands Juno a note and she beams. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow sports kit. Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A posse of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband the color washing from his pale cheeks. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows. A thin smile flashes across her heartshaped face and she cuts a pipe between her teeth. She gets on her bike and rides off leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich. Juno cycles up to Dancing El. k. School parks her bike and secures it with a chain lock. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students most of them taller than her reaching her locker.

A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail swigs from a small plastic bottle as she contemplates an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her. In a flashback she steps out of her knickers and walks slowly across the room toward a skinny boy sitting barechested in the same armchair. Wearing just a Tshirt she straddles the boy's lap giving a tentative smile as she brings her rosebud lips close to his face stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy blond dog does what he is told. The girl takes a swig of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her hoodie. She picks up a pregnancy kit then reaches for the washroom key which he hands to her. test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: Beneath a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow perched on a gentle slope looks out over an uneven lawn. A young man with long blond hair tied back in a small ponytail swigs from a small plastic bottle as he contemplates an armchair standing on the lawn in front of him. In a flashback, he steps out of his knickers and walks slowly across the room toward a tall girl sitting bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, he straddles the girl's lap, giving a tentative smile as he brings his rosebud lips close to her face, stopping her mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy blond dog does what it's told. The boy takes a swig of juice and wipes his mouth on the sleeve of his hoodie. He picks up a pregnancy kit, then reaches for the washroom key, which she hands to him. In the washroom, he unzips his jeans, sits down on the lavatory seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, brings out a narrow paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. He pulls out the stick and gives it a cursory look, then hurries back through the store towards the counter where he slaps a pack of sweets onto it and gazes at the test. He shakes it, rolls his eyes at the clerk, and leaves the store, stick in hand, his expression suddenly forlorn. Charlie slings a rope of candy onto the branch of a tree and makes a noose, bites into the liquorish rope, and wanders off home. Kitchens have the light switch doubling as a doll's penis, and naked dolls are clustered on the mantelpiece. There's a photo of Parker playing his guitar. Charlie dials a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, and a boy lying on his bed with a turtle on his chest answers. They take up the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car. Parker hands Charlie a note and she beams. Parker wears his brown and yellow sports kit. Charlie sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A posse of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug. Charlie lowers her eyes as Parker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband, the color washing from his pale cheeks. Charlie blinks happily as Parker swallows. A thin smile flashes across his heart-shaped face, and he cuts a pipe between his teeth. He gets on his bike and rides off, leaving Parker clutching his sandwich. Charlie cycles up to Dancing Elk School, parks his bike, and secures it with a chain lock. He makes his way past the oncoming throng of students, most of them taller than him, reaching his locker.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Under a starry sky, a high-rise cabin perched on a steep hill looks out over a smooth courtyard. A teenage girl with short blonde hair tied back in a tiny bun sips from a large metal flask as she contemplates a bench standing on the courtyard in front of her. In a flashback, she steps out of her sandals and walks slowly across the room toward a muscular boy sitting bare-chested in the same bench. Wearing just a dress, she straddles the boy's lap, giving a tentative smile as she brings her cherry lips close to his face, stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy black cat does what he's told. The girl takes a sip of coffee and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her jacket. She picks up a journal, then reaches for the kitchen spoon, which he hands to her. In the kitchen, she unzips her shorts, sits down on the barstool, opens the pregnancy detection journal, brings out a wide paddle-shaped bookmark, and puts it into position. She pulls out the bookmark and gives it a cursory look, then hurries back through the library towards the counter where she slaps a pack of gum onto it and gazes at the journal. She shakes it, rolls her eyes at the librarian, and leaves the library, bookmark in hand, her expression suddenly forlorn. Juno slings a jumprope onto the branch of a bush and makes a knot, bites into the licorice rope, and wanders off home. Kitchens have the light switch doubling as a toy’s leg, and dressed dolls are clustered on the bookshelf. There's a photo of Bleeker playing his drums. Juno dials a number on her cake-shaped phone, and a girl lying on her bed with a cat on her chest answers. They take up the bench, shoving it into the back of a truck. Bleeker hands Juno a flower and she beams. Bleeker wears his green and red sports kit. Juno sits in the bench on his front porch. A posse of cyclists in green and red passes by on a carpet. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his red headband, the color washing from his pale cheeks. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows. A thin smile flashes across her oval-shaped face, and she cuts a cable between her teeth. She gets on her scooter and rides off, leaving Bleeker clutching his apple. Juno rides up to Dancing Elk School, parks her scooter, and secures it with a rope lock. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of teachers, most of them shorter than her, reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Beneath a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow leans on a gentle slope overlooks an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail gulps from a small plastic bottle as she surveys an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her. In a flashback, she slides out of her knickers and glides slowly across the room toward a skinny boy lounging bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, she hops onto the boy's lap, offering a tentative smile as she brushes her rosebud lips close to his face, halting his mouth with a gentle peck. The shaggy blond dog follows his instincts. The girl takes a gulp of juice and dabs her mouth on the sleeve of her hoodie. She grabs a pregnancy kit, then reaches for the washroom key, which he tosses to her. In the washroom, she slips out of her jeans, perches on the lavatory seat, unwraps the pregnancy detection kit, pulls out a narrow paddle-shaped stick, and sets it into place. She removes the stick and glances at it, then dashes back through the store towards the counter where she drops a pack of sweets onto it and stares at the test. She jiggles it, rolls her eyes at the clerk, and exits the store, stick in hand, her expression suddenly glum. Juno drapes a rope of candy onto the branch of a tree and weaves a loop, nibbles into the liquorish rope, and ambles off home. Bedrooms have the light switch doubling as a doll's hat, and naked dolls are huddled on the mantelpiece. There's a photo of Bleeker strumming his guitar. Juno taps a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, and a girl reclining on her bed with a rabbit on her chest responds. They grab the armchair, cramming it into the back of a car. Bleeker tosses Juno a note and she grins. Bleeker sports his brown and yellow sports kit. Juno perches in the armchair on his front lawn. A posse of runners in brown and yellow skips by on a rug. Juno averts her eyes as Bleeker's eyes wander beneath his yellow sweatband, the color draining from his pale cheeks. Juno beams happily as Bleeker munches. A thin smile flits across her heart-shaped face, and she nibbles a pipe between her teeth. She hops on her bike and pedals off, leaving Bleeker holding his sandwich. Juno pedals up to Dancing Elk School, parks her bike, and fastens it with a chain lock. She winds her way past the approaching throng of students, most of them towering over her, reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Beneath a turbulent ocean, a towering skyscraper perched on a rugged cliff looks out over a jagged sidewalk. A robotic cat with long gray fur tied back in a large knot guzzles from a rusty metal can as it contemplates a teacup standing on the sidewalk in front of it. In a flashback, it steps out of its sneakers and walks slowly across the garden toward a plump fish sitting bare-scaled in the same teacup. Wearing just a scarf, it straddles the fish's tail, giving a hesitant blink as it brings its patterned whiskers close to the fish's face, stopping its fins with a gentle nudge. The spiky green cactus does what it's told. The cat takes a guzzle of soda and wipes its whiskers on the hem of its cape. It picks up a weather kit, then reaches for the umbrella key, which it hands to it. In the umbrella, it unzips its overalls, sits down on the bench seat, opens the weather prediction kit, brings out a wide spoon-shaped leaf, and puts it into position. It pulls out the leaf and gives it a cursory sniff, then hurries back through the museum towards the painting where it slaps a stack of postcards onto it and gazes at the forecast. It shakes it, rolls its eyes at the artist, and leaves the museum, leaf in paw, its expression suddenly joyous. Banjo slings a coil of yarn onto the rung of a ladder and makes a bow, bites into the cotton yarn, and saunters off home. Kitchens have the knob doubling as a dinosaur's horn, and painted dinosaurs are clustered on the bookshelf. There's a photo of Scribbles strumming his violin. Banjo dials a number on their football-shaped calculator, and a lizard lying on its bed with a turtle on its tail answers. They take up the teacup, shoving it into the back of a spaceship. Scribbles hands Banjo a coin and it grins. Scribbles wears his plaid and purple dance shoes. Banjo sits in the teacup on its back patio. A parade of cyclists in plaid and purple passes by on a towel. Banjo lowers its ears as Scribbles's eyes cross beneath his purple headband, the color washing from his bright scales. Banjo blinks eagerly as Scribbles applauds. A big grin flashes across its square face, and it slices a carrot between its fangs. It gets on its surfboard and paddles off, leaving Scribbles clutching his journal. Banjo paddles up to Rolling Rainbow Academy, docks its surfboard, and secures it with a ribbon leash. It makes its way past the approaching herd of sailors, most of them taller than it, reaching its cubby.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Beneath a misty horizon, a towering lighthouse squats on a rugged cliff and surveys an uneven landscape. A teenage boy with long blonde hair tied back in a loose bun gulps from a tiny glass bottle as he examines a bench resting on the field before him. In a flashback, he peels off his socks and tiptoes cautiously across the hallway toward a plump girl sitting relaxed in the same bench. Wearing only a sweater, he perches delicately on the girl's lap, offering a nervous grin as he inches his plum lips close to her face, halting her mouth with a gentle brush. The furry black cat jumps when it's startled. The boy takes a gulp of water and rubs his mouth on the hem of his shirt. He grabs a compass, then lunges for the kitchen spoon, which she passes to him. In the kitchen, he unzips his backpack, settles onto the countertop, unwraps the navigation gadget, removes a slim wand-like object, and adjusts it into position. He extracts the object and inspects it briefly, then rushes back through the market towards the register where he drops a pack of cookies onto it and peers at the gadget. He stirs it, rolls his eyes at the cashier, and exits the market, gadget in hand, his demeanor suddenly disheartened. Marco dangles a string of beads onto the tip of a pole and fashions a loop, bites into the sugared string, and strolls home. Kitchens have the faucet doubling as a doll's arm, and dressed dolls are gathered on the bookshelf. There's a painting of Pat reading his book. Marco taps a code on his pineapple-themed phone, and a boy resting on his couch with a squirrel on his stomach responds. They hoist the bench, wedging it into the trunk of a truck. Pat hands Marco a ticket and he grins. Pat dons his red and white marching band outfit. Marco reclines in the bench on his front yard. A cluster of cyclists in red and white zoom past on a bridge. Marco raises his gaze as Pat's eyes narrow beneath his white headband, the color draining from his rosy cheeks. Marco blinks cheerfully as Pat gulps. A slight grin dances across his oval face, and he slices a carrot between his fingers. He hops onto his scooter and speeds away, leaving Pat holding his apple. Marco scoots up to Riverside Academy, parks his scooter, and secures it with a padlock. He weaves his way past the approaching wave of classmates, most of them bulkier than him, reaching his cubby.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Beneath a starry night, a towering skyscraper balanced on a rocky cliff observes an uneven pattern of tiles. A teenage girl with spiky black hair tied back in a large braid gulps from a giant steel mug as she analyzes a suitcase balancing on the tiles in front of her. In a memory, she leaps out of her blouse and skips quickly across the field toward a muscular boy lounging shirtless in the same suitcase. Wearing just a jacket, she clambers onto the boy's chair, giving a daring grin as she brings her chapped cheeks near to his ear, halting his breath with a firm hug. The shaggy brown goat completes its task. The girl takes a gulp of water and cleans her chin on the collar of her cloak. She grabs a mystery book, then reaches for the workshop latch, which he tosses to her. In the workshop, she unties her shoelaces, crouches down on the sofa cushion, unwraps the mystery unveiling kit, extracts a wide spoon-shaped spatula, and sets it into motion. She retracts the spatula and gives it a detailed inspection, then rushes back through the gallery towards the podium where she slams a box of crackers onto it and inspects the kit. She spins it, winks at the usher, and exits the gallery, spatula in hand, her expression suddenly curious. Juno flings a string of beads onto the handle of a cart and crafts a knot, nibbles on the licorice string, and strides off home. Kitchens have the faucet doubling as a doll's slipper, and clothed dolls are scattered on the footstool. There's a photo of Bleeker tuning his violin. Juno presses a code on her pizza-shaped tablet, and a boy lying on his hammock with a hamster on his back replies. They claim the suitcase, cramming it into the trunk of a truck. Bleeker tosses Juno a card and she grins. Bleeker wears his blue and orange hiking gear. Juno reclines in the suitcase on his backyard deck. A troupe of skaters in blue and orange skates over a mat. Juno lifts her gaze as Bleeker's eyes dart beneath his orange helmet, the color flushing to his rosy cheeks. Juno blinks contentedly as Bleeker coughs. A broad grin flickers across her moon-shaped face, and she slices a straw between her lips. She climbs onto her scooter and zooms off, leaving Bleeker holding his apple. Juno scooters up to Prancing Moose College, parks her scooter, and ties it with a ribbon lock. She moves her way through the approaching cluster of travelers, most of them larger than her, reaching her backpack.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Under a starry night, a towering lighthouse slouches on a rugged cliffside gazing out over a sparse desert. An elderly man with long gray hair braided into a sizable bun gulps from a large glass pitcher as he examines a rocking chair sitting in the desert next to him. In a dream sequence, he removes his sandals and tiptoes briskly across the garden toward a plump woman reclining fully clothed in the same rocking chair. Clad only in overalls, he sits on the woman’s lap, showing a timid grin as he brings his chapped knuckles near her forehead, halting her nose with a gentle touch. The scruffy white cat ignores what's asked. The man takes a sip of lemonade and brushes his chin on the collar of his jacket. He grabs a lottery ticket, then reaches for the cash register receipt, which she hands to him. In the kitchen, he unbuttons his shirt, lowers himself onto the wooden stool, unseals the lottery results booklet, extracts a wide card-shaped leaflet, and flips it into view. He flips over the leaflet and gives it a hasty glance, then rushes back through the kitchen towards the sink where he slams a stack of dishes onto it and stares at the results. He spins it, shrugs at the cook, and exits the kitchen, leaflet in hand, his demeanor suddenly jubilant. Marvin tosses a strand of spaghetti onto the edge of a table and forms a loop, chomps into the spaghetti strand, and strolls off to bed. Basements have the light bulb doubling as a teddy bear's ear, and clothed teddy bears are scattered on the bookshelf. There's a portrait of Nelson juggling oranges. Marvin presses digits on his owl-shaped calculator, and a boy sitting on a couch with a squirrel on his shoulder responds. They hoist the rocking chair, wedging it into the trunk of a van. Nelson gives Marvin a pencil and he grins. Nelson wears his red and white marching uniform. Marvin lounges in the rocking chair on his back porch. A group of skaters in red and white speeds by on a carpet. Marvin raises his eyebrows as Nelson's eyebrows tighten above his white headband, the shade draining from his rosy cheeks. Marvin winks contentedly as Nelson gulps. A wide grin sweeps across his diamond-shaped chin, and he snaps a twig between his fingers. He jumps on his scooter and glides away, leaving Nelson munching his apple. Marvin scoots up to Orange Elk College, parks his scooter, and fastens it with a rope lock. He weaves his path past the approaching crowd of teachers, most of them shorter than him, reaching his drawer.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Under a cloudy sky, a teenage girl with short brown hair contemplates an armchair on her lawn. In a flashback, she kisses a bare-chested boy sitting in the same armchair. After swigging juice, she takes a pregnancy test, glances at the result, and leaves the store looking forlorn. Juno creates a noose from licorice, eats it, and goes home. Her room is cluttered with naked dolls, and a photo shows Bleeker playing guitar. Juno calls a girl with a rabbit on her chest. They take the armchair and load it into a car. Bleeker gives Juno a note, making her smile. Wearing his sports kit, Bleeker exchanges glances with Juno as runners pass by. Juno rides her bike to Dancing Elk School, locks it, and navigates through taller students to reach her locker.

test_cases.name: Jumble Segments Order
test_cases.description: Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn Bleeker hands Juno a note and she beams Juno slings a rope of candy onto the branch of a tree and makes a noose bites into the liquorish rope and wanders off home Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students most of them taller than her reaching her locker She picks up a pregnancy kit then reaches for the washroom key which he hands to her The girl takes a swig of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her hoodie Bedrooms have the light switch doubling as a doll's penis and naked dolls are clustered on the mantelpiece answers She shakes it rolls her eyes at the clerk and leaves the store stick in hand her expression suddenly forlorn Juno cycles up to Dancing El There is a photo of Bleeker playing his guitar A posse of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug They take up the armchair shoving it into the back of a car k A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail swigs from a small plastic bottle as she contemplates an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her Juno dials a number on her hamburgershaped phone and a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit on her chest In a flashback she steps out of her knickers and walks slowly across the room toward a skinny boy sitting barechested in the same armchair Bleeker wears his brown and yellow sports kit School parks her bike and secures it with a chain lock The shaggy blond dog does what he is told A thin smile flashes across her heartshaped face and she cuts a pipe between her teeth In the washroom she unzips her jeans sits down on the lavatory seat opens the pregnancy detection kit brings out a narrow paddleshaped stick and puts it into position She pulls out the stick and gives it a cursory look then hurries back through the store towards the counter where she slaps a pack of sweets onto it and gazes at the test She gets on her bike and rides off leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich Beneath a cloudy sky a lowrise bungalow perched on a gentle slope looks out over an uneven lawn Wearing just a Tshirt she straddles the boy's lap giving a tentative smile as she brings her rosebud lips close to his face stopping his mouth with a tender kiss Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband the color washing from his pale cheeks
